existing_features.title: Remove the bottom margin spacing applied to the tabs area on the HomePage, PondPage, TagPage, and TagHubPage so that there is no extra vertical gap below the tab bar before the main card/list content.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove margin-bottom from the Tabs component on the homepage, pond page, tag page, and tags (taghub) page.

projectName: Remove bottom margin from tabs on Home, Pond, Tag, and TagHub pages
